data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brown, John W., Matthews, Deborah L., Miller, Jacqueline Y. (2018): Two new species of Megalota from the Bahamas (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Olethruetinae). Zootaxa 4455 (3): 597-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4455.3.18|7 occurrences
